nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 3am. Cloudy. Low around 4, with temperatures rising to around 10 overnight. Southeast wind around 8 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Patchy Blowing Snow
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of snow between 7am and 8am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing rain between 8am and noon, then patchy blowing snow and a slight chance of snow between noon and 1pm. Partly sunny. High near 39, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Freezing Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of freezing rain between midnight and 3am, then a chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 32 overnight. Southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 42. West wind 13 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. Northwest wind 15 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 47 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 17. North wind 7 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 6. East wind around 12 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 15. North wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -10. Northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near -2. Northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -12. North wind 7 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 5. Southeast wind 7 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -7. Southeast wind around 10 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 15.
